area.key: Select the site (or root node) the redirect should apply to. If a site is not selected, the redirect will apply to all domains/sites in the Umbraco solution.
When enabled, the query string of the original request is forwarded to the redirect location (pass through).
Specify the original URL to match from which the user should be redirected to the destination.
Select the page or URL the user should be redirected to.
There has not yet been added any redirects.
There has not yet been added any redirects to this page.
There has not yet been added any redirects to this media.
Your search did not match any redirects.
The specified URL is not valid. A valid URL should look like /page or /page/subpage.
Fill out the fields below to add a new redirect.
Are you sure you want do delete the redirect at %0% ?
Your redirect has successfully been added.
The redirect could not be saved due to an error on the server.
Your redirect has successfully been saved.
The redirect could not be saved due to an error on the server.
You must specify the original URL.
The specified URL is not valid.
You must select a destination page or link.
A content item with the specified ID could not be found.
A media item with the specified ID could not be found.
You must specify a URL for the redirect.
You must specify a destination link for the redirect.
Specified link mode is not valid.
This page has not been created yet. You must save and publish the page in order to be able to add redirects to it.
This page is currently not published. Redirects to unpublished pages may result in unexpected behaviour - eg. where the visitors are redirected to non-existing URLs.
This page is in the recycle bin. Redirects to this page may therefore result in unexpected behaviour - eg. where the visitors are redirected to non-existing URLs.
This media is in the recycle bin. Redirects to this media may therefore result in unexpected behaviour - eg. where the visitors are redirected to non-existing URLs.
Select the site (or root node) the redirect should apply to. If a site is not selected, the redirect will apply to all domains/sites in the Umbraco solution.
Specify the original URL to match from which the user should be redirected to the destination.
Select the page or URL the user should be redirected to.
Select the type of the redirect. Notice that browsers will remember permanent redirects.
Are you sure you want to delete the redirect at %0% ?
